subtitle: The French way of making custard.

method.text: Put the milk and vanilla essence in a pan. Heat to just below the boil.
Whisk together the sugar and egg yolks until thick and pale. Gradually add the heated milk and whisk well.
Return the sauce back to the heat, and gently re-heat, stirring constantly for 2-3 min, until the sauce coats the back of a spoon. Take care not to boil as the sauce will separate.

title: Creme anglaise
